item.name: Home
item.description: What Happens When You Run Out of Firm Tofu? So, I came up with this Kimchi Soondoboo Chigae recipe a couple weeks ago because my kimchi was lookin’ beautifully sour and I could not find any firm tofu in my house. All I had was 4 boxes of silken tofu. So, I decided to just […]
